name: signbcapp
friendlyName: Business Central - Sign App with certificate through Container
description: Sign App for Dynamics 365 Business Central with usage of container
author: Kine

inputs.name: useazurekeyvault
inputs.label: Use Azure Key Vault
inputs.helpMarkDown: Use HSM backed KeyVault for the certificate.

inputs.name: skiptoolinstall
inputs.label: Skip tool install
inputs.helpMarkDown: Skip install of tools. Use this if you have already installed the tools on the agents.

inputs.name: keyvaultcertificatename
inputs.label: Key Vault Certificate Name
inputs.helpMarkDown: Name of the certificate in the Key Vault

inputs.name: accesstoken
inputs.label: Access Token
inputs.helpMarkDown: Access Token to be used to authenticate to Azure Key Vault.

inputs.name: clientid
inputs.label: Client ID
inputs.helpMarkDown: Client ID for the Azure AD Application

inputs.name: tenantid
inputs.label: Tenant ID
inputs.helpMarkDown: Tenant ID for the Azure AD Application

inputs.name: clientsecret
inputs.label: Client Secret
inputs.helpMarkDown: Client secret for the Azure AD Application

inputs.name: filedigest
inputs.label: File Digest
inputs.helpMarkDown: File digest to be used for signing. sha256 is recommended.

inputs.name: timestampservice
inputs.label: Timestamp Service
inputs.helpMarkDown: Timestamp service to be used for signing. http://timestamp.digicert.com is recommended.

inputs.name: timestampdigest
inputs.label: Timestamp Digest
inputs.helpMarkDown: Timestamp digest to be used for signing. sha256 is recommended.

inputs.name: appfile
inputs.label: App file
inputs.helpMarkDown: Path to the App file to be published. Filter could be used. All found files will be published

inputs.name: appfileexclude
inputs.label: App file Exclude
inputs.helpMarkDown: Path to the App file to be excluded. Filter could be used.

inputs.name: certfile
inputs.label: Certificate file name
inputs.helpMarkDown: Path and file name of the certificate to be used to sign the app.
